title: 钟表菜单右键无法打开
author: tanenjie
txt_content: 我的钟表菜单设置为347(时钟)，但重置了却打不开！！怎么办!急用

replies.author: 孤独秋叶
replies.txt_content:
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '      &b&l菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 5

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'fc' #修改这个"com...nd"后面成bs就可以用指令/bs打开了，修改不加斜杠如'bs'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item-id/data-value to 0)
  # In this case it will open with a book (right click)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347 #这个是打开菜单的物品ID，如果你用它打开不了，建议你修改成指令打开
    left-click: true
    right-click: true
    data-value: 0

replies.author: tanenjie
replies.txt_content:
11392761 发表于 2016-1-16 13:50
是ChestCommands插件吗
是的，就是ChestCommands 我试了好多遍 都不能
